post_text: May 25, 2016 at 4:52 PM#1MA-hive,Has anyone started down the road of creating Layouts based on spreadsheet values? My XML formatting skills are sorely lacking but I'd be willing to coordinate with anyone interested in developing this.Thanks in advance.Rodd McLaughlin
